case.title: BBW LOOKING FOR LOVE - 38
case.text:
I'm YOUR SIMPLE GIRL NEXT DOOR LOOKING FOR THAT AMAZING MASCULINE GUY FROM AROUND THE NEIGHBORHOOD. I'M HAITIAN AND 37 SEND YOUR PICS, LIKES AND DISLIKES AND I'LL DEFINETLY RESPOND AND SEND MY PICS. MAYBE WE'LL HAVE A LOVE CONNECTION OR MAYBE A GREAT FRIEND. PLEASE MUST BE D& D FREE. HAVE A JOB AND DON'T LIVE WITH YOUR MOM.UNLESS YOUR TAKING CARE OF HER.
LAST BUT NOT LEAST I'M A SINGLE PARENT SO PLEASE BE SERIOUS AND NOT WAIST MY TIME.
